name: stargarden
title: Stargarden
desc: A modern, content-focused starter theme for Astro, styled with Tailwind CSS and daisyUI.
article:
Welcome to the future, travelerâwhere the splendor of the Atomic Age meets modern Astro web development! StarGarden is your trusty rocket for launching simple, markdownâpowered websites into cyberspace with unmatched style and efficiency.


Features:


  • Tailwind CSS & DaisyUI â Streamlined, customizable styling, complete with theme-switching for that radiant neon glow.
  • Markdown & Content Collections â Pen your prose in plain Markdown while the theme organizes posts posthaste.
  • SEO Essentials â Built-in astro-seo for stellar metadata and social previews.
  • Responsive Layouts â Navigation, hero, and footer components adapt gracefully from pocket radios to panoramic view-screens.
  • Sitemap â Auto-generated so your avid listeners never miss a broadcast.
  • Search â Built in search with astro-pagefind.
  • Code Highlighting â Beautiful syntax highlighting with astro-expressive-code.


And more coming soon...
